efac:Change.efbc:ChangeDescription: The closing date has been extended from 12.09.2024 12.30 pm to 30/09/2024 12.30 pm. The latest date to request additional information is 18.09.2024 17.00 hours.

efac:ChangeReason.efbc:ReasonDescription: The closing date has been extended from 12.09.2024 12.30 pm to 30/09/2024 12.30 pm. The latest date to request additional information is 18.09.2024 17.00 hours.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: ATU Galway City Science Equipment Under 5 Lots
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Atlantic Technological University (ATU) Galway City Campus wishes to award a contract(s) for supply of various pieces of Science Equipment under five (5) lots. These specialised scientific instruments and equipment are essential for a wide range of research, clinical, and laboratory applications. The successful tenderers will be responsible for the supply, delivery, installation, and commissioning of the equipment, as well as providing comprehensive training and after-sales support to the end-users, and scheduled maintenance and repair. Tenderers are invited to apply for one or more of the available lots, depending on their capabilities and the specific equipment required. • Lot 1 – 80 Freezer - Ultra Low Temperature Freezers (for storage of materials at -80°C) • Lot 2 – Top Loading Autoclave (High Pressure Steam) • Lot 3 – Fluorescent Microscope – Polarising Capabilities • Lot 4 – Pre-Treatment Module for Tissue Specimens (Tissue Prep) • Lot 5 – Ultra Centrifuge. Please refer to attached documentation for further information.

cac:RealizedLocation.cbc:Description: Please refer to attached documentation for further information

cac:ContractExtension.cbc:OptionsDescription: Option for Maintenance and Repairs upto 5 years duration

cac:Period.cbc:Description: Option for Maintenance, Repairs, Service and Spare Parts for upto 5 years
